ComicInfo.Title: Love You to Pieces; [Untitled]
ComicInfo.Summary: Bones crunching, worms munching, blood spattering...these are a few of our favorite things! From some of the most dark and cunning minds in horror comes DC Horror Presents... a new collection of gruesome tales set in the DCU. With stories penned by some of our favorite names in horror, this anthology will have die-hard horror fans quaking with fear!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-05 14:52:11. [CVDB1074567]
ComicInfo.Writer: David Dastmalchian, Dracmorda Boulet, Leah Kilpatrick, Swanthula Boulet
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Christian Ward, Dave Johnson, Francesco Francavilla, Tyler Crook
ComicInfo.Characters: Circe, Dollhouse, Dollmaker, Donna Troy, Hippolyta, Orithia, Wonder Woman
ComicInfo.Teams: Amazons of Themyscira, Gotham City Police Department, Gotham EMT, Zombies
